function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Density of POIs around railway stations positively associated with infection ratio","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission at railway stations","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures at railway stations, promote social distancing","Technologies":"Crowd management systems, real-time occupancy monitoring","People":"Passengers, station staff, general public","Owner":"Transport authorities, railway operators"},{"Description":"Low airline coverage from Hubei Province to county-level cities in China","Impact":"Limited access to air travel increases reliance on other modes of transportation","Mitigation":"Improve airline coverage, enhance public transport infrastructure","Technologies":"Airline route optimization, public transport network planning","People":"Travelers, airline operators, local governments","Owner":"Airline companies, government transportation agencies"},{"Description":"Travel time by public transport negatively related to infection ratio","Impact":"Longer travel times increase risk of disease transmission on public transport","Mitigation":"Improve public transport efficiency, promote alternative travel options","Technologies":"Transportation network optimization, ride-sharing platforms","People":"Public transport users, commuters, local authorities","Owner":"Public transport operators, local governments"}]}
